channel.title: [PI] Webclient Cache Error
channel.description:
Here is the error I get on my webclient and only my webclient [code]ava.security.AccessControlException: access denied (java.io.FilePermission nullmain_file_cache.dat read) at java.security.AccessControlContext.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.lang.SecurityManager.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.lang.SecurityManager.checkRead(Unknown Source) at java.io.File.exists(Unknown Source) at sign.signlink.run(signlink.java:47) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.security.AccessControlException: access denied (java.io.FilePermission nullmain_file_cache.dat read) at java.security.AccessControlContext.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.lang.SecurityManager.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.lang.SecurityManager.checkRead(Unknown Source) at java.io.File.exists(Unknown Source) at sign.signlink.run(signlink.java:47) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Here6 java.lang.NullPointerException at client.cleanUpForQuit(client.java:6004) at RSApplet.exit(RSApplet.java:132) at RSApplet.destroy(RSApplet.java:174) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Exception in thread "Thread-21" java.security.AccessControlException: access denied (java.io.FilePermission nullMaps\mapConfig.txt read) at java.security.AccessControlContext.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.lang.SecurityManager.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.lang.SecurityManager.checkRead(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.(Unknown Source) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:78) at client.startUp(client.java:8485) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:5780) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code] WEBLCLIENT.htm [code]

[/code] When I load it It stops...

item.title: [PI] Webclient Cache Error
item.dc:creator: @propker212 propker212
item.description:
@propker212 wrote:

Here is the error I get on my webclient and only my webclient

ava.security.AccessControlException: access denied (java.io.FilePermission nullmain_file_cache.dat read) at java.security.AccessControlContext.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.lang.SecurityManager.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.lang.SecurityManager.checkRead(Unknown Source) at java.io.File.exists(Unknown Source) at sign.signlink.run(signlink.java:47) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.security.AccessControlException: access denied (java.io.FilePermission nullmain_file_cache.dat read) at java.security.AccessControlContext.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.lang.SecurityManager.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.lang.SecurityManager.checkRead(Unknown Source) at java.io.File.exists(Unknown Source) at sign.signlink.run(signlink.java:47) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Here6 java.lang.NullPointerException at client.cleanUpForQuit(client.java:6004) at RSApplet.exit(RSApplet.java:132) at RSApplet.destroy(RSApplet.java:174) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Exception in thread "Thread-21" java.security.AccessControlException: access denied (java.io.FilePermission nullMaps\mapConfig.txt read) at java.security.AccessControlContext.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.lang.SecurityManager.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.lang.SecurityManager.checkRead(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:78) at client.startUp(client.java:8485) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:5780) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
